title: AI-Powered ChatBot with Bedrock Agent, OpenSearch, and ECS
description: Create a serverless AI-powered ChatBot using Amazon Bedrock agent, Amazon OpenSearch Serverless, AWS Lambda, and Amazon ECS with Application Load Balancer

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates how to create an AI-powered ChatBot using Amazon Bedrock for the AI agent, Amazon OpenSearch Serverless for vector search, AWS Lambda for processing, Amazon ECS with Fargate for hosting, and Application Load Balancer for routing. The pattern includes a Bedrock agent with Knowledge Base and Action Groups, and is implemented using AWS CDK with .NET.

See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions, including how to interact with the Bedrock agent, search for flights using the ALB endpoint, and verify processing in OpenSearch and Lambda functions.

authors.name: Tejas Vora
